name: Into the abyss (itch) (noTmeDev)
description:
Info

Into the abyss is platformer shooting game. Dive deeper and deeper int o the abyss find new ithems fight enemies and bosses, explore new biomes. Play in the original world or create your own.

Controls

w a s d - movement

t - inventory/interact

click - shoot

esc - menu/quit
